side.description: I am a new Computer Engineer in the field. I love programming and customizing Operating Systems.

knowledge-desc:
In this section I expose my preferences when developing code, among them:

- I prefer the use of Angular as a framework and the use of TypeScript as a programming language.
- As Operating Systems, I prefer the use of Ubuntu, for programming, but I have no problem adapting to any other Operating System.
- As for tools, I like the use of Figma and Photoshop, but I am open to learning or using any other tool.
